name: Time in a Bubble
description:
A game made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 

Sometimes work.. or games.. can make us forgetting and neglecting a lot of things. Including our lover. 

What if there is a door that can lead us to a world full of times ?

What if we can catch some of those times, with bubble ? Why bubble though ?

If it's me, I would surely use those times to spend just with someone dearest to me. This is a game about that. Hope you like it despite being very short and perhaps not that difficult.

Thanks.

Credits

Font : Daniel Linssen

Music : Kevin MacLeod (Song title : Eastern Thought & Nu Flute)
